exceptions.exn: In environment b_nat : nat Hb_nat : 2 <= b_nat i : nat IHi : i <= 0 -> alpha_nat i <= alpha_nat 0 H : S i <= 0 Unable to unify "0 <= ?M1489" with "alpha_nat (S i) <= alpha_nat 0".

In environment b_nat : nat Hb_nat : 2 <= b_nat i, j : nat IHi : i <= S j -> alpha_nat i <= alpha_nat (S j) H : S i <= S j IHj : (i <= j -> alpha_nat i <= alpha_nat j) -> S i <= j -> alpha_nat (S i) <= alpha_nat j Unable to unify "S ?M1503 <= S ?M1504" with "match i with | 0 => 1 | S r => b_nat * alpha_nat i - alpha_nat r end <= match j with | 0 => 1 | S r => b_nat * alpha_nat j - alpha_nat r end".

original: induction i. - intros. apply Nat.le_0_l. - intros. induction j. + apply Nat.le_0_l. + simpl. apply le_n_S. apply IHi. apply le_S_n. auto.
